Member Function Documentation

void GridOperation::GridOpChangeColumnText ( wxString  ColumnText,
int  iColumn,
bool  bSize = TRUE 
)

Allow to change one column name.

Parameters:
ColumnText The new name of the column
iColumn The column index to be changed, 0 is the first column.
bSize If bSize = TRUE, we resize the cols to fit the content otherwise the col is not resized. bSize is set to TRUE ( default).
